com.cisco.dvbu.ps.deploytool.gui.core.module.group

Class GroupModulesDAO

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cisco.dvbu.ps.deploytool.gui.core.module.group.GroupModulesDAO

  • public class GroupModulesDAO
extends java.lang.Object

    Data access object for group modules. Used by GroupModuleResource servlet.

    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Calvin Goodrich

    • Method Detail

      • list

        public ListResult list(java.lang.String path,
              java.lang.String isSearch,
              int numRows,
              int pageNum,
              java.lang.String sortIndex,
              java.lang.String sortOrder,
              java.lang.String filters,
              java.lang.String searchField,
              java.lang.String searchString,
              java.lang.String searchOper,
              java.lang.String param)

        Sorts and filters the list of Group objects and returns a ListResult object containing the requested page of information.

        Parameters:
        isSearch - Indicates whether the request is a search request ("true" or "false".)
        numRows - Number of rows to return.
        pageNum - Page number to return (based on numRows.)
        sortIndex - Data element to sort on (as represented by a column in the UI.)
        sortOrder - Sort order ("asc" or "desc".)
        filters - Multi-row filtering (not currently used.)
        searchField - Search field to search on (isSearch = "true".)
        searchString - String to search for (isSearch = "true".)
        searchOper - Search operation (equals or "eq", not equals or "ne", etc.)
        param - Parameter name identifier to pass back when called to generate parameter value pick lists.
        Returns:
        The requested list of items.
        See Also:
        GroupModuleResource

      • findByPath

        public GroupModule findByPath(java.lang.String path)

        Searches for a group module based on a URL encoded path and populates a GroupModule object.

        Parameters:
        path - The URL encoded ID to look for.
        Returns:
        The requested group module as an GroupModule object.
        See Also:
        GroupModuleResource

      • serialize

        public void serialize(GroupModule gm)
               throws java.lang.Exception

        Writes the group module to disk as an XML file.

        Parameters:
        gm - The group module to write out.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
